chrome.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

firefox.notes: Before Firefox 59, this property returned pending for Animations with incomplete asynchronous operations but as of Firefox 59 this is indicated by the separate Animation.pending property. This reflects recent changes to the specification.
